string.text: You fight valiantly, but as the battle concludes you find yourself surrounded. You do your best to hold your enemies at bay, but as they close in one of them knocks your weapon to the ground, and another grabs your arms, shackling them behind you. Their leader appraisingly gropes your groin and and buttocks, nodding approvingly as you are rounded up with the rest of the captives.
What will happen to you now?
Your enemies take your weapons and armor as you surrender. Their leader briefly gropes your groin and buttocks, nodding approvingly as you are rounded up with the rest of the captives.
What will happen to you now?...

Your attempt to infiltrate the castle fails spectacularly, and you are quickly surrounded by guards. They take your weapons, dragging you to the dungeons where they throw you into a cell, commenting that their leader will certainly enjoy such a fiery guest.

You are stripped of your clothing and weapons, your chiseled chest, thick cock and pert buttocks on display for every horny woman in camp. You suspect you'll be the star in more than one of their nighttime fantasies...

You are stripped of your clothing and weapons, your chiseled chest, thick cock and pert buttocks on display for every horny woman in town. You suspect you'll be the star in more than one of their nighttime fantasies...

You are stripped of your clothing and weapons, your chiseled chest, thick cock and pert buttocks on display for every horny woman in the village. You suspect you'll be the star in more than one of their nighttime fantasies...

You're spotted as you attempt to escape, and a group of your captors shove you to the ground, binding your wrists with ropes to prevent any further resistance. They decide to take your punishment into their own hands, beating you into unconsciousness.
Maybe that wasn't a great idea.

You're almost spotted by a group of unusually wary guards as you leave camp, but manage to give them the slip by throwing a rock in the other direction as you scurry away. You breathe a well-earned sigh of relief when you're sure you've escaped.
